TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebScriptServiceHostFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceHostFactory

summary.span: 在可动态激活服务的主机实例以响应传入消息的托管宿主环境下，能够向该服务中自动添加 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点而无需进行配置。

span.span: Automatically adds an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service, without requiring configuration, in a managed hosting environment that dynamically activates host instances for the service in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此工厂提供一种无需配置便可将 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点添加到服务的方法。This factory provides a way to add an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service without requiring configuration. 可将终结点添加到在配置中定义的任何其他终结点（如果存在）。The endpoint is added to any other endpoints that are defined in configuration, if any. 支持这种动态主机激活的托管宿主环境为 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和 Windows 进程激活服务 (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support this type of dynamic host activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Services (WAS). 若要使用此工厂，指定中`Factory`属性[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指令。To use this factory, specify the in the `Factory` attribute of the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive. 可使用 和 及所有默认设置配置由此工厂创建的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点。The ASP.NET AJAX endpoint created by this factory is configured with the and the , with all the default settings. 可在相对于 .svc 文件的空地址处创建该终结点。The endpoint is created at an empty address relative to the .svc file. 如果服务配置已在此地址处定义了一个终结点，则会引发 并且无法启动该服务。If service configuration already defines an endpoint at this address, an is thrown and the service fails to start. ## Examples 指定的值的`Factory`属性中[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指令来激活的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点`MyService`服务下面的示例中所示。Specify the for the value of the `Factory` attribute in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive to activate an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint for the `MyService` service as shown in the following example. ``` <% @ServiceHost Service="MyService" Language="C#" Debug="true" Factory="WebScriptServiceHostFactory" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会在服务激活过程中自动调用此构造函数，因此无需手动调用此方法。Normally, this constructor is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost (Type serviceType, Uri[] baseAddresses);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost CreateServiceHost(class System.Type serviceType, class System.Uri[] baseAddresses) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateServiceHost (serviceType As Type, baseAddresses As Uri()) As ServiceHost
protected: override System::ServiceModel::ServiceHost ^ CreateServiceHost(Type ^ serviceType, cli::array <Uri ^> ^ baseAddresses);

span.span: The type of service to host.

param.name: baseAddresses
param.span: 类型为 且包含所承载服务的基址的 。

span.span: The of type that contains the base addresses for the service hosted.

summary.span: 为具有特定基址的指定类型的服务创建 的派生类，在某些情况下可使用该服务来自动启用 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点。

span.span: Creates a derived class of for a specified type of service with a specific base address that can be used to automatically enable ASP.NET AJAX endpoints in certain scenarios.

returns.span: 使用指定基址指定的该类型服务的 。

span.span: A for the type of service specified with the specified base address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会在服务激活过程中自动调用此方法，因此无需手动调用它。Normally, this method is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.

exception.span: 另一个服务使用相同的基址，或另一个终结点正在使用与此工厂试图创建的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点相同的地址。

span.span: Another service uses the same base address, or another endpoint is using the same address as the ASP.NET AJAX endpoint that this factory is trying to create.
